question: This country ranks top in Retail Destination in 2017 by replacing China.
explanation: India has replaced China as the top retail destination in 2017, as part of the global retail development index. According to India Retail Report 2017, over the past 12-15 months, 100 percent cash and carry operations are gaining significance in India with Thailand's Siam Makro being the latest entrant in this space following Metro, Walmart and Booker.
